 = Global Variables =

These variables are visible to controllers in all scripting engines.
 *	vm      - the view manager
 *	session - the user session
 *	uploads - the upload manager
 *	site    - interface to user.properties
 *	requestInfo - simplified interface to information about the 
 *	reqp    - the pathinfo, minus the leading slash (deprecated; use requestInfo)     
 *	rp      - the request processor; used to invoke external 
 *	id      - the runtime identifier; (usage is fuzzy ATM)
 *	jdbc    - the JDBC connection manager
 *	hsf     - Hibernate session factory manager
 *	writer  - used to emit raw responses
 *	installBase - a string showing the installation base for this instance of gossamer 
current HTTP request
requestInfo.pathInfo which includes the leading slash)
 *	factory - a proxy for the spring bean factory
 *	request - the HttpServletRequest object
 *	response - the HttpServletResponse object
controllers

 == session - User Session ==

This provides our interface to session-level storage. It support 2 methods:

{{{
   session.set(key,value)

ruby:         $session.set("foo","bar")
javascript:   session.set('foo','bar');
groovy:       session.foo = 'bar'; session.set('foo') = "bar";
}}}
----

{{{
   session.get(key)

python:       val = session.get('foo')
groovy:       def val = session.foo; val= session.get('foo')
javascript:   var val = session.get('foo');
}}}
